name: You Versus 27 Elves
description:
The Christmas elves have turned
In this single-player, turn-based strategy game, it's just you and the elves. You must protect yourself as you progress through the evil modicum of elves by any means necessary.

Though simple in appearance, you will find at its core that You Versus 27 Elves is about strategy, procedure, and thinking outside the box.

So be warned: This game will test you.
This game will break you (probably won't happen).
This game will take your assumptions and break them apart with a tiny little hammer (probably will happen).

Are you ready for a challenge, human?
